column3: rgya'i skad du / / +ta'i ching pa'i h'a ming mun lun / /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406849#406862#TD4071E.TXT.r_1190;TD4071E.TXT.r_1191# ci ste gzhan ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sred pa 'byung  ba'i tshor ba khyad par du mdzad pa de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i reg pa yang kha cig tu khyad par du mdzad do snyam du sems su dogs nas / /

column3: bod skad du / / +theg pa chen po'i chos brgya gsal ba'i sgo'i bstan bcos / /

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad bdag med do zhes gsungs pa ni chos thams cad    ces bya ba gang yin pa dang  bdag med pa de gang la brjod ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406861#406870#TD4071E.TXT.r_1190;TD4071E.TXT.r_1191;TD4071E.TXT.r_1192# ci ste gzhan ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sred pa 'byung  ba'i tshor ba khyad par du mdzad pa de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa 'byung ba'i reg pa yang kha cig tu khyad par du mdzad do snyam du sems su dogs nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406870#406879#TD4071E.TXT.r_1191;TD4071E.TXT.r_1192;TD4071E.TXT.r_1193;TD4071E.TXT.r_1194# reg pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // / +de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa yin no // /

column3: chos thams cad ni bsdu na ngo bo lnga yod de / / +sems kyi chos dang sems las byung ba'i chos dang  gzugs kyi chos dang  'du byed phan tshun mi ldan pa'i chos dang  'dus ma byas kyi chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406878#406895#TD4071E.TXT.r_1193;TD4071E.TXT.r_1194;TD4071E.TXT.r_1195;TD4071E.TXT.r_1196# gzhan dag  na re zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gzhan dag gzhan du lan 'debs pa yin te / / +'di skad du gal te reg pa gang du yang khyad par ma mdzad du zin kyang / /

column3: de la thams cad khyad  par du bya ba'i phyir dang  'di dang phan tshun ldan pa'i phyir dang  mngon du gyur pa'i phyir dang  bye brag 'di rnams mi 'dra ba'i phyir dang  don mngon du bya ba'i phyir rim pa 'di ltar dbye bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406896#406904#TD4071E.TXT.r_1195;TD4071E.TXT.r_1196;TD4071E.TXT.r_1197# 'on kyang tshor ba la sogs pa skyed pa gsum yang dag 'dus pa khyad par du 'phags pa kho na yin par brjod par 'dod  de ; / +khyad par du 'phags pa gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406905#406912#TD4071E.TXT.r_1197;TD4071E.TXT.r_1198# gang gi mjug thogs su reg pa 'byung ba'i 'dus pa nus pa can gang yin pa ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406912#406921#TD4071E.TXT.r_1198;TD4071E.TXT.r_1199;TD4071E.TXT.r_1200;TD4071E.TXT.r_1201;TD4071E.TXT.r_1202# de yang tshor ba la sogs pa sun 'byin pa'i tshe med na ji ltar reg pa yin / /

column3: sems kyi chos la ngo bo brgyad yod de / / +mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba'i rnam  par shes pa dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406920#406931#TD4071E.TXT.r_1199;TD4071E.TXT.r_1200;TD4071E.TXT.r_1201;TD4071E.TXT.r_1202;TD4071E.TXT.r_1203# de med pa'i phyir / / +tshor ba la sogs pa la ga la yod de / / +de'i phyir / / +yid KYI RNAM PAR SHES PA 'BA' zhig lus pa yin no zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406931#406943#TD4071E.TXT.r_1203;TD4071E.TXT.r_1204;TD4071E.TXT.r_1205# 'o na de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon gyis sun dbyung ba'i phyir / /

column3: sems las byung ba'i chos la bsdu na  ngo bo drug yod de / / +kun du 'gro ba lnga yod pa dang  gzhan yul nges pa la lnga yod pa dang  dge ba la bcu gcig yod pa dang  rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa drug yod pa dang  rjes su 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu yod pa dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406944#406954#TD4071E.TXT.r_1205;TD4071E.TXT.r_1206# de las cir 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba ni    gzhan gyi skyon ma mthong nas smras pa yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406954#406971#TD4071E.TXT.r_1206;TD4071E.TXT.r_1207;TD4071E.TXT.r_1208;TD4071E.TXT.r_1209;TD4071E.TXT.r_1210# gal te dge ba yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni slob dpon no // /

column3: gzhan du 'gyur ba bzhi yod pa'o // / +kun du 'gro ba lnga gang  zhe na / / +yid la byed pa dang  reg pa dang  tshor ba dang  sems pa dang  'du shes so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406969#406982#TD4071E.TXT.r_1208;TD4071E.TXT.r_1209;TD4071E.TXT.r_1210;TD4071E.TXT.r_1211;TD4071E.TXT.r_1212# de'i phyir / / +ma chags pa la sogs pa yod  na yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // /
column5: 0.022#TD4050E.TXT.r#1100513#1100513#TD4050E.TXT.r_491;TD4050E.TXT.r_492# des cir 'gyur de dang tha dad na ni yan lag thams cad kyis kyang tha dad pa thob par 'gyur zhing kun gzhi  rnam par shes pa skad cig mas kyang gnod par 'gyur te / / +de dang tha dad pa'i phyir de la dge ba dang mi dge ba bdag gi bag chags yod pa sa bon nyid yin par 'gyur na de ni lung du ma bstan par 'dod do // /

column3: gzhan yul nges pa lnga gang zhe na / / +'dun pa dang  khyad par dran pa dang  mos pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406980#406993#TD4071E.TXT.r_1210;TD4071E.TXT.r_1211;TD4071E.TXT.r_1212;TD4071E.TXT.r_1213# gal te ma chags pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa med pa'i phyir dge ba ma yin par 'gyur na / / +'o na rnam par shes pa de / /

column3: dge ba bcu gcig gang zhe na / / +dad pa dang  brtson 'grus dang   ngo tsha yod pa dang  khrel yod pa dang  'dod chags med pa dang  zhe sdang med pa dang  gti mug med pa dang  shin tu sbyangs par gnas pa dang  bag yod pa dang  btang snyoms dang  rnam par mi 'tshe ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#406994#407005#TD4071E.TXT.r_1212;TD4071E.TXT.r_1213;TD4071E.TXT.r_1214;TD4071E.TXT.r_1215# de ma thag pa'i rkyen dge ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la 'jug pa'i sems kyis bskyed  pa'i phyir / / +dge ba nyid du 'gyur ro snyam du sems par dogs na ma yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407006#407016#TD4071E.TXT.r_1215;TD4071E.TXT.r_1216# dge ba'i mjug thogs su sems rnam pa gsum 'byung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di skad du / /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349791#2349791#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4493;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4494# sems kyi mtshan ma de la dmigs pa'i lhag mthong la rnam pa gsum yod pa'i phyir / / +bar chad med pa'i sems la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas kyi  sems la yang rnam pa gsum yod do zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#577525#577525#TD4068E.TXT.r_895;TD4068E.TXT.r_896# ma brjed pa'i don nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir / / +sems la gsal ba'o zhes bya ba smos te / /
column8: 0.029#TD4098E.TXT.r#1390975#1390975#TD4098E.TXT.r_187;TD4098E.TXT.r_188# sngon myong ba la sogs pa sems pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o // / +de yang rnam pa gsum ste / /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404597#2404597#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11109# 'di ltar sa 'di la bar chad med cing rgyun chad pa med par mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su zhugs pas na sa    drug pa ltar re zhig tsam du mngon du gyur pa ma yin pa dang  gzhan yang brgyad pa rnam par dag pa'i sa dang nye bar gyur pas don rnam pa gnyis po 'di dang ldan pa'i phyir ring du song ba'i sa zhes bya'o // /
column10: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1131037#1131037#TD4047E.TXT.r_1417;TD4047E.TXT.r_1418# byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o // / +de yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya'o zhes rab tu bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa drug gang zhe na / / +'dod chags dang  zhe sdang  dang ; / +ma rig pa dang  nga rgyal dang  the tshom dang  phyin ci log gi lta ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407017#407029#TD4071E.TXT.r_1216;TD4071E.TXT.r_1217;TD4071E.TXT.r_1218# dge ba'i mjug thos su ni dge ba la sogs pa'i  sems rnam pa gsum 'byung bar gzhan na dmigs pa yin no / /

column3: rjes su 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu gang zhe na / / +khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  'tshig pa dang  'chab pa dang  gyo ba dang  rgyags pa dang  sgyu dang  rnam par 'tshe ba dang  phrag dog     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407028#407043#TD4071E.TXT.r_1217;TD4071E.TXT.r_1218;TD4071E.TXT.r_1219# gal te de ma thag pa'i rkyen dge ba'i dbang gis dge ba nyid du 'gyur na / / +mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa gnyis kyang der thal bar 'gyur ba zhig na de yang 'dod pa ma yin te / /

column3: ser sna dang  ngo tsha med pa dang  khrel med pa dang  ma dad pa dang  le lo dang  bag med pa dang  rmugs pa dang  rgod pa dang  dran pa dor ba dang  shes pa phyin ci log dang  rnam par gyeng ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407044#407066#TD4071E.TXT.r_1219;TD4071E.TXT.r_1220;TD4071E.TXT.r_1221;TD4071E.TXT.r_1222;TD4071E.TXT.r_1223;TD4071E.TXT.r_1224;TD4071E.TXT.r_1225# de bas na phan pa'i dbang  gis dge ba nyid ma yin par 'dod par mi bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +gzhan yang skyon 'di yang yod do zhes bstan pa'i phyir / /

column3: gzhan du 'gyur ba bzhi gang zhe  na ; / +gnyid dang  dpyod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  rtog pa'o // /
gzugs kyi chos la bsdu na ngo bo bcu gcig gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407067#407074#TD4071E.TXT.r_1223;TD4071E.TXT.r_1224;TD4071E.TXT.r_1225# dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs te nus pa  nyid do // / +des gang la dge ba nyid de / / +dge ba'i ngo bo yod pa 'phangs shing bskyed pa de la de skad ces bya'o // /

column3: mig gi dbang po dang  rna ba'i dbang po dang  sna'i dbang po dang  lce'i dbang po dang  lus kyi dbang po dang  gzugs dang  sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang   reg bya dang  chos kyi phyogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407075#407082#TD4071E.TXT.r_1225;TD4071E.TXT.r_1226;TD4071E.TXT.r_1227;TD4071E.TXT.r_1228;TD4071E.TXT.r_1229# dge ba'i ngo bo yod pa 'phangs shing bskyed pa de la de skad ces bya'o // / +de yang ci zhig ce na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407082#407095#TD4071E.TXT.r_1227;TD4071E.TXT.r_1228;TD4071E.TXT.r_1229;TD4071E.TXT.r_1230;TD4071E.TXT.r_1231;TD4071E.TXT.r_1232;TD4071E.TXT.r_1233;TD4071E.TXT.r_1234# sems so // / +de lta yin na cir 'gyur zhe na / / +de'i phyir / /

column3: btags pa pa 'du byed phan tshun mi ldan pa'i chos la bsdu na ngo bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407096#407104#TD4071E.TXT.r_1231;TD4071E.TXT.r_1233;TD4071E.TXT.r_1234;TD4071E.TXT.r_1232;TD4071E.TXT.r_1235# de ldog pa ni dge ba  nyid log pa ste / / +de ldog pa'i rgyu ni de ldog pa'i rgyu'o // / +de mi rung ba ni mi 'thad pa nyid do // /

column3: thob pa dang  srog gi rtsa ba dang  skal ba rigs mthun pa dang  so so'i skye bo dang  'du shes med pa pa dang  rdzogs pa'i 'du shes pa dang  'gog  pa snyoms par 'jug pa dang  ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs dang  skye ba dang  rgas pa dang  gnas pa dang  mi rtag pa dang  rgyun 'khor ba dang  so sor nges pa dang  phan tshun 'brel ba dang  stobs myur ba dang  go rims dang  dus dang   phyogs dang  grangs dang  spyod pa mthun pa'i tshogs dang  spyod pa mi mthun pa'i tshogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407103#407114#TD4071E.TXT.r_1235;TD4071E.TXT.r_1236;TD4071E.TXT.r_1237# 'di skad du gal te de ma thag pa'i rkyen dge ba'i dbang gis phyi ma'i dus na 'byung ba'i sems dge ba nyid du 'gyur na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407115#407127#TD4071E.TXT.r_1236;TD4071E.TXT.r_1237;TD4071E.TXT.r_1238# de lta na 'o na ni lan cig     // / +dge ba skyes na 'khor ba ji srid yod kyi bar du phyi ma'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad dge ba nyid du 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407127#407142#TD4071E.TXT.r_1237;TD4071E.TXT.r_1238;TD4071E.TXT.r_1239;TD4071E.TXT.r_1240;TD4071E.TXT.r_1241# dge ba skyes na 'khor ba ji srid yod kyi bar du phyi ma'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad dge ba nyid du 'gyur te / / +mi dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan pa gnyis med par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column7: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#596493#596493#TD4068E.TXT.r_3124# de bas na sbyor ba'i sems kyi de ma    thag pa'i rkyen de las langs pa'i tshe 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams skye bas kun gzhi mi dgos so // /

column3: 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la bsdu na ngo bo drug gang zhe na / / +stong pa nyid kyi 'dus ma byas dang  brtags pas 'gog pa'i 'dus ma byas dang  brtags pas 'gog pa ma yin pa'i  'dus ma byas dang  mi gyo ba'i 'dus ma byas dang  'du shes dang  tshor ba'i 'dus ma byas dang  rnam pa de bzhin nyid kyi 'dus ma byas so zhes bya ba'i phyir bdag gi chos de med par gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407143#407154#TD4071E.TXT.r_1240;TD4071E.TXT.r_1241;TD4071E.TXT.r_1242# zhes bya ba 'dis ni rtsis mgo bsgre ba ste / / +ji ltar dge ba nyid mi 'thad pa de bzhin du mi dge ba yang bshad ma thag pa'i rigs pas mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407155#407172#TD4071E.TXT.r_1242;TD4071E.TXT.r_1243;TD4071E.TXT.r_1244;TD4071E.TXT.r_1245;TD4071E.TXT.r_1246# ci ste gzhan gal te 'gog pa'i sems dge ba dang  mi dge bar mi 'thad na snyoms par 'jug  pa de ji ltar na / /

column3: de rnams bsdu na ngo bo yang gnyis yod de / / +dang po gang zag gi bdag med pa  dang ; / +gnyis pa chos kyi bdag med pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407173#407183#TD4071E.TXT.r_1245;TD4071E.TXT.r_1246;TD4071E.TXT.r_1247;TD4071E.TXT.r_1248# zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / / +'gog pa bzhin du zhes bya ba ni / / +ji ltar thar pa ni sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dge ba zhes bya'i / /

column3: theg pa chen po'i chos brgya gsal ba'i sgo'i bstan bcos yongs su rdzogs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407182#407191#TD4071E.TXT.r_1247;TD4071E.TXT.r_1248;TD4071E.TXT.r_1249;TD4071E.TXT.r_1250# ji ltar thar pa ni sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dge ba zhes bya'i / / +dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir / /

column3: rgya'i dpe las slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad par snang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407192#407200#TD4071E.TXT.r_1250;TD4071E.TXT.r_1251;TD4071E.TXT.r_1252# 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang dus re zhig zhi bas de tsam gyis na de dge ba yin gyi / /

column3: ding sang bod rnams dpal ldan chos skyong gis mdzad ces grags so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407201#407208#TD4071E.TXT.r_1251;TD4071E.TXT.r_1252;TD4071E.TXT.r_1253# yang dag par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +ci ste de dge ba dang  mi dge ba ma yin par  'gyur na / /

column3: dpal ldan dbang phyug rgya'i lo ts'a ba thang sam tsang zhes bya bas rgya gar las rgya'i yul du bsgyur zhing phyis ston pa dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bas bsgyur bar zhus pa'i don du gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde pa las rab tu byung ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407209#407225#TD4071E.TXT.r_1253;TD4071E.TXT.r_1254;TD4071E.TXT.r_1255;TD4071E.TXT.r_1256# 'o na bsgribs la lung du ma bstan par 'gyur mod snyam du sems su dogs nas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407226#407239#TD4071E.TXT.r_1256;TD4071E.TXT.r_1257;TD4071E.TXT.r_1258;TD4071E.TXT.r_1259# mdo gang las zhu ba bcu 'byung ba de ni // / +zhu ba bcu'i mdo ste des  mtshon pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column6: 0.023#TD4071E.TXT.r#407662#407664#TD4071E.TXT.r_1319# 'on kyang spyod lam pa la sogs pas 'gyur mod snyam du sems  su dogs nas / /
column7: 0.025#TD4071E.TXT.r#409103#409103#TD4071E.TXT.r_1590# ci ste gzhan dag de ni gnyen po'i sems la gnas pa nyid spong bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems su dogs nas / /

column3: rgya nag chen po'i lha btsun chos kyi rin chen gyis  dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4071E.TXT.r#407240#407264#TD4071E.TXT.r_1258;TD4071E.TXT.r_1259;TD4071E.TXT.r_1260;TD4071E.TXT.r_1261;TD4071E.TXT.r_1262;TD4071E.TXT.r_1263;TD4071E.TXT.r_1264# gzhan yang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas / / +skyon gzhan 'di yang yod do zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column5: 0.019#TD4071E.TXT.r#407663#407664#TD4071E.TXT.r_1319# 'on kyang spyod lam pa la sogs pas 'gyur mod snyam du sems  su dogs nas / /

column3: // / +rgya'i skad du / / +ta'i ching pa'i h'a ming mun lun / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329094#329107#TD4035E.TXT.r_9088;TD4035E.TXT.r_9089;TD4035E.TXT.r_9090;TD4035E.TXT.r_9091# bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gang dag mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba dang  mi mthun pa dang  mthun pa'i chos rnams gang dag mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba dang mthun pa dang  mtshan nyid la dmigs pa de  bzhin nyid du gtogs pa'i chos rnams gang dag so sor khong du chud par bya ba dang  yon tan khyad par can du gtogs pa'i chos rnams gang dag par bya ba dang  'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i chos rnams gang dag so sor bsten pas spang bar bya ba dang  spangs  nas kun du 'byung ba rnams dang  mthar phyin pa'i chos rnams gang dag bdag gi don thob pa ngag gis mngon sum du bya ba'o // / +sangs rgyas kyi bka' shes bya'i gnas gang zhe na / /
column5: 5.960#TD4035E.TXT.r#329170#329172#TD4035E.TXT.r_9096;TD4035E.TXT.r_9097# 'di lta ste / / +kha cig srog chags bsad pa la sogs pa dang  spyod lam dang bzo'i gnas la sogs pa lhur len pa lta bu dag ste / /

column3: bod skad du / / +theg pa chen po'i chos brgya gsal ba'i sgo'i bstan bcos / /

column3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo // /

column3: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad bdag med do zhes gsungs pa ni chos thams cad    ces bya ba gang yin pa dang  bdag med pa de gang la brjod ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329131#329140#TD4035E.TXT.r_9092;TD4035E.TXT.r_9093# dang po ni kha zas kyi dbang gis byung ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329141#329152#TD4035E.TXT.r_9093;TD4035E.TXT.r_9094# gnyis pa ni srog gi dbang po'i 'du byed kyi dbang gis byung ba'o // /

column3: chos thams cad ni bsdu na ngo bo lnga yod de / /

column3: sems kyi chos dang sems las byung ba'i chos dang  gzugs kyi chos dang  'du byed phan tshun mi ldan pa'i chos dang  'dus ma byas kyi chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329169#329185#TD4035E.TXT.r_9095;TD4035E.TXT.r_9096;TD4035E.TXT.r_9097;TD4035E.TXT.r_9098# mi  dge ba dang  lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams la yang bag yod pa yod de / / +'di lta ste / / +kha cig srog chags bsad pa la sogs pa dang  spyod lam dang bzo'i gnas la sogs pa lhur len pa lta bu dag ste / /
column5: 5.960#TD4035E.TXT.r#329101#329103#TD4035E.TXT.r_9089;TD4035E.TXT.r_9090# sangs rgyas kyi bka' shes bya'i gnas gang zhe na / / +sems can gnas pa gsum ste / /
column6: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#329199#329200#TD4035E.TXT.r_9099# tshe 'di  nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'grub par byed la / /

column3: de la thams cad khyad  par du bya ba'i phyir dang  'di dang phan tshun ldan pa'i phyir dang  mngon du gyur pa'i phyir dang  bye brag 'di rnams mi 'dra ba'i phyir dang  don mngon du bya ba'i phyir rim pa 'di ltar dbye bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329183#329193#TD4035E.TXT.r_9097;TD4035E.TXT.r_9098;TD4035E.TXT.r_9099# kha cig srog chags bsad pa la sogs pa dang  spyod lam dang bzo'i gnas la sogs pa lhur len pa lta bu dag ste / / +dge ba'i chos la bag yod pa gang yin pa de ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329193#329209#TD4035E.TXT.r_9098;TD4035E.TXT.r_9099;TD4035E.TXT.r_9100;TD4035E.TXT.r_9101# dge ba'i chos la bag yod pa gang yin pa de ni / / +tshe 'di  nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'grub par byed la / /

column3: sems kyi chos la ngo bo brgyad yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329221#329232#TD4035E.TXT.r_9102;TD4035E.TXT.r_9103# sems can gyi 'jig rten dang  snod kyi 'jig rten las brtsams pa'i spros pa thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos gnyis te / /

column3: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang  rna ba'i rnam  par shes pa dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang  rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329231#329246#TD4035E.TXT.r_9102;TD4035E.TXT.r_9103;TD4035E.TXT.r_9104# sems can gyi 'jig rten dang  snod kyi 'jig rten las brtsams pa'i spros pa thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'i chos gnyis te / / +'dzin pa'i chos dang  de'i gnas te gzung ba'i chos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329247#329263#TD4035E.TXT.r_9104;TD4035E.TXT.r_9105# 'jig rten rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gnod pa dang  phan pa ma yin pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ni gnyis te / /

column3: sems las byung ba'i chos la bsdu na  ngo bo drug yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329262#329279#TD4035E.TXT.r_9104;TD4035E.TXT.r_9105;TD4035E.TXT.r_9106# 'jig rten rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gnod pa dang  phan pa ma yin pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ni gnyis te / / +de kho na mi rtogs pa dang  de sngon du 'gro ba'i gnod pa 'dod pa'o // /

column3: kun du 'gro ba lnga yod pa dang  gzhan yul nges pa la lnga yod pa dang  dge ba la bcu gcig yod pa dang  rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa drug yod pa dang  rjes su 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu yod pa dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329280#329287#TD4035E.TXT.r_9106;TD4035E.TXT.r_9107# 'di    las phyi rol pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba ni gnyis te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329288#329295#TD4035E.TXT.r_9106;TD4035E.TXT.r_9107;TD4035E.TXT.r_9108# 'di    las phyi rol pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba ni gnyis te / / +'jig tshogs la lta ba'i dbang du byas nas / / +bdag rtag par rtog pa dang  chad par rtog pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329296#329305#TD4035E.TXT.r_9108;TD4035E.TXT.r_9109# bdag rtag par rtog pa dang  chad par rtog pa'o // / +sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba ni gnyis te / /

column3: gzhan du 'gyur ba bzhi yod pa'o // / +kun du 'gro ba lnga gang  zhe na / /

column3: yid la byed pa dang  reg pa dang  tshor ba dang  sems pa dang  'du shes so // /

column3: gzhan yul nges pa lnga gang zhe na / /

column3: 'dun pa dang  khyad par dran pa dang  mos pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab bo // /

column3: dge ba bcu gcig gang zhe na / /

column3: dad pa dang  brtson 'grus dang   ngo tsha yod pa dang  khrel yod pa dang  'dod chags med pa dang  zhe sdang med pa dang  gti mug med pa dang  shin tu sbyangs par gnas pa dang  bag yod pa dang  btang snyoms dang  rnam par mi 'tshe ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329360#329370#TD4035E.TXT.r_9113;TD4035E.TXT.r_9114;TD4035E.TXT.r_9115# ston pa po yang phyin ci log tu lta zhing log par zhugs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329371#329378#TD4035E.TXT.r_9114;TD4035E.TXT.r_9115# de las bzlog pa'i dkar po'i phyogs kyang chos gnyis su rig par bya'o // / +'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i legs pa'i tshul yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshams las  'das par 'gyur ba'i chos ni gnyis te / /

column12: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#1393499#1393500#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_574# tshig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir sgra'i rang bzhin te / /
column13: 0.022#TD4051E.TXT.r#2296267#2296268#TD4051E.TXT.r_5072# de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchog tu kha na ma tho ba mi mnga'o zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa kha na ma tho ba spangs pa'i phyir ro // /
column14: 0.022#TD4051E.TXT.r#2296431#2296432#TD4051E.TXT.r_5085# brtsal mi dgos pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni lhun gyis grub pa'i rnam pa ston to // /
column15: 0.022#TD4089E.TXT.r#1011558#1011559#TD4089E.TXT.r_203;TD4089E.TXT.r_204# khams bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas dang po'o //// / +lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la // /
column16: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#1326012#1326013#TD4091E.TXT.r_7319;TD4091E.TXT.r_7320# rnam pa gcig dang  gnyis dang  bzhi pa dag yin la / / +de dag gi gtso bo ni 'di gsum gyis bsdus so // /
column17: 0.023#TD4091E.TXT.r#1281772#1281773#TD4091E.TXT.r_3253;TD4091E.TXT.r_3254# gzhi ni grub pa'i bza' btung bzhin // / +dper na grub zin pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba ni yongs su longs spyad  par bya ba 'ba' zhig yin gyi yang bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa ltar / /
column18: 0.024#TD4051E.TXT.r#2296357#2296357#TD4051E.TXT.r_5078# skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  mya ngan las 'das par kun du ston pas yongs su smin pa dang  rna par grol par mdzad pa'i phyir ro // /
column19: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#1282640#1282640#TD4091E.TXT.r_3338;TD4091E.TXT.r_3339# gnas ni dbang po dang bcas pa'i lus so // / +de rgyas par byed pa ni kham gyi zas so // /

column3: rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa drug gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329390#329399#TD4035E.TXT.r_9115;TD4035E.TXT.r_9116# 'jig rten pa dang  'jig rten las 'das pa'i legs pa'i tshul yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshams las  'das par 'gyur ba'i chos ni gnyis te / / +bdag nyid kyi chos kyi dbang las byung ba'i sgo nas 'bras bu mi sdug pa la mi lta bas kha na ma tho ba la mi 'dzem pa dang  gzhan gyis bsad pa dang  bcing ba dang  sma dbab pa dang  smad pa la mi lta bas tshe 'di'i kha  na ma tho ba la mi 'dzem pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329575#329580#TD4035E.TXT.r_9130;TD4035E.TXT.r_9129# rkyen 'di'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  mthun pa rnam par rgyun du yid la byed pa'o // /

column3: 'dod chags dang  zhe sdang  dang ; / +ma rig pa dang  nga rgyal dang  the tshom dang  phyin ci log gi lta ba'o // /

column5: 0.014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#906111#906112#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6844# mig gi mngon sum gyi tshad mas mthong ba gang yin pa de ni mthong ba zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#339896#339896#TD4035E.TXT.r_9934;TD4035E.TXT.r_9935# phyi rol gyi gzugs la mos pa kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang  gnyis pa ste nang na gzugs su 'du shes pa zil gyis mnan pa dang  sdug pa dang mi sdug pa gnyis su med pa'i gzugs su mchog tu btang snyoms pa la mos pa cha phra ba ste / / +rnam par  thar pa gsum po 'di dag ni gzugs thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyir / /

column3: rjes su 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329417#329425#TD4035E.TXT.r_9116;TD4035E.TXT.r_9117# bdag nyid kyi chos kyi dbang las byung ba'i sgo nas 'bras bu mi sdug pa la mi lta bas kha na ma tho ba la mi 'dzem pa dang  gzhan gyis bsad pa dang  bcing ba dang  sma dbab pa dang  smad pa la mi lta bas tshe 'di'i kha  na ma tho ba la mi 'dzem pa'o // /

column3: khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  'tshig pa dang  'chab pa dang  gyo ba dang  rgyags pa dang  sgyu dang  rnam par 'tshe ba dang  phrag dog     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329426#329437#TD4035E.TXT.r_9116;TD4035E.TXT.r_9117;TD4035E.TXT.r_9118# bdag nyid kyi chos kyi dbang las byung ba'i sgo nas 'bras bu mi sdug pa la mi lta bas kha na ma tho ba la mi 'dzem pa dang  gzhan gyis bsad pa dang  bcing ba dang  sma dbab pa dang  smad pa la mi lta bas tshe 'di'i kha  na ma tho ba la mi 'dzem pa'o // / +de las bzlog pa'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos kyang gnyis su rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329438#329446#TD4035E.TXT.r_9117;TD4035E.TXT.r_9118# de las bzlog pa'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos kyang gnyis su rig par bya'o // / +tshegs med pa dang 'bras bu yod par tshangs par spyod cing gnas par 'gyur ba ni bcas pa gnyis te / /

column3: dang ; / +ser sna dang  ngo tsha med pa dang  khrel med pa dang  ma dad pa dang  le lo dang  bag med pa dang  rmugs pa dang  rgod pa dang  dran pa dor ba dang  shes pa phyin ci log dang  rnam par gyeng ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329445#329456#TD4035E.TXT.r_9118;TD4035E.TXT.r_9119;TD4035E.TXT.r_9120# tshegs med pa dang 'bras bu yod par tshangs par spyod cing gnas par 'gyur ba ni bcas pa gnyis te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329457#329467#TD4035E.TXT.r_9119;TD4035E.TXT.r_9120;TD4035E.TXT.r_9121# yang dag par bslab pa'i gzhi bcas gang las  'gal bar byas nas / / +kha na ma tho ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  'gal ba byas nas slar yang dag par nges par 'byung bar bcas pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329467#329476#TD4035E.TXT.r_9120;TD4035E.TXT.r_9121# kha na ma tho ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang  'gal ba byas nas slar yang dag par nges par 'byung bar bcas pa'o // / +bya ba byas pa rnams kyi bdag dang pha rol la phan par 'gyur ba'i chos ni gnyis te / /

column3: gzhan du 'gyur ba bzhi gang zhe  na ; / +gnyid dang  dpyod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  rtog pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329477#329492#TD4035E.TXT.r_9121;TD4035E.TXT.r_9122# bya ba byas pa rnams kyi bdag dang pha rol la phan par 'gyur ba'i chos ni gnyis te / /

column3: gzugs kyi chos la bsdu na ngo bo bcu gcig gang zhe na / /

column3: mig gi dbang po dang  rna ba'i dbang po dang  sna'i dbang po dang  lce'i dbang po dang  lus kyi dbang po dang  gzugs dang  sgra dang  dri dang  ro dang   reg bya dang  chos kyi phyogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329508#329517#TD4035E.TXT.r_9123;TD4035E.TXT.r_9124;TD4035E.TXT.r_9125# tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa dang  'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas na yang / / +rigs kyi bu chos 'dod pa rnams la dus dus su dam pa'i chos ston cing dam pa'i chos la rtog pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329517#329525#TD4035E.TXT.r_9124;TD4035E.TXT.r_9125# rigs kyi bu chos 'dod pa rnams la dus dus su dam pa'i chos ston cing dam pa'i chos la rtog pa'o // / +so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang  pha rol gyi     // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329526#329539#TD4035E.TXT.r_9125;TD4035E.TXT.r_9126;TD4035E.TXT.r_9127# so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang  pha rol gyi     // /

column3: btags pa pa 'du byed phan tshun mi ldan pa'i chos la bsdu na ngo bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329538#329548#TD4035E.TXT.r_9127;TD4035E.TXT.r_9128# tshe 'di la bden pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos ni gnyis te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329549#329559#TD4035E.TXT.r_9128;TD4035E.TXT.r_9129# phyi ma la dbang po yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir // / +rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i rgyu so sor rtog pa dang  de bzhin gshegs  pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab par snang ba stong pa nyid dang ldan zhing / /

column3: thob pa dang  srog gi rtsa ba dang  skal ba rigs mthun pa dang  so so'i skye bo dang  'du shes med pa pa dang  rdzogs pa'i 'du shes pa dang  'gog  pa snyoms par 'jug pa dang  ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs dang  skye ba dang  rgas pa dang  gnas pa dang  mi rtag pa dang  rgyun 'khor ba dang  so sor nges pa dang  phan tshun 'brel ba dang  stobs myur ba dang  go rims dang  dus dang   phyogs dang  grangs dang  spyod pa mthun pa'i tshogs dang  spyod pa mi mthun pa'i tshogs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329560#329569#TD4035E.TXT.r_9129;TD4035E.TXT.r_9130# rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i rgyu SO SOR RTOG PA DANG  de bzhin gshegs  pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab par snang ba stong pa nyid dang ldan zhing / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329580#329588#TD4035E.TXT.r_9130;TD4035E.TXT.r_9131# rkyen 'di'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  mthun pa rnam par rgyun du yid la byed pa'o // /

column10: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#329035#329036#TD4035E.TXT.r_9088# bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gang dag mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba dang  mi mthun pa dang  mthun pa'i chos rnams gang dag mngon par rtogs pa'i mthar thug par 'gro BA DANG MTHUN PA DANG  mtshan nyid la dmigs pa de  bzhin nyid du gtogs pa'i chos rnams gang dag so sor khong du chud par bya ba dang  yon tan khyad par can du gtogs pa'i chos rnams gang dag par bya ba dang  'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i chos rnams gang dag so sor bsten pas spang bar bya ba dang  spangs  nas kun du 'byung ba rnams dang  mthar phyin pa'i chos rnams gang dag bdag gi don thob pa ngag gis mngon sum du bya ba'o // /

column3: 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la bsdu na ngo bo drug gang zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329631#329644#TD4035E.TXT.r_9135;TD4035E.TXT.r_9136# gcig la gcig 'grogs na bde bar 'gyur ba'i chos ni  gnyis te / /

column3: stong pa nyid kyi 'dus ma byas dang  brtags pas 'gog pa'i 'dus ma byas dang  brtags pas 'gog pa ma yin pa'i  'dus ma byas dang  mi gyo ba'i 'dus ma byas dang  'du shes dang  tshor ba'i 'dus ma byas dang  rnam pa de bzhin nyid kyi 'dus ma byas so zhes bya ba'i phyir bdag gi chos de med par gsungs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329645#329656#TD4035E.TXT.r_9136;TD4035E.TXT.r_9137;TD4035E.TXT.r_9138# gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa bzod pa dang  bdag nyid kyang gzhan la gnod par mi byed pa'o // /

column5: 0.022#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#3126892#3126893#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3334# skyes bu rmongs pa long ba khyod mig dang ldan pa dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang lhan cig chos mngon pa dang  'dul ba'i gtam bya bar sems sam zhes de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char byed la mngon sum du spyos nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bos te / /

column3: dpal ldan dbang phyug rgya'i lo ts'a ba thang sam tsang zhes bya bas rgya gar las rgya'i yul du bsgyur zhing phyis ston pa dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bas bsgyur bar zhus pa'i don du gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde pa las rab tu byung ba / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#329744#329752#TD4035E.TXT.r_9143# nyes pa med pa  la yang dga' ba dang  mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyi rjes su slob cing nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang  lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad so so yang dag par rtog pa'i dbang du byas nas / /

column8: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#1669519#1669519#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3313;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3314# sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la yod pa'i ma rig pa'i mun pa de ni phyi nang gi chos rten cing 'brel  te 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid du yod pa de ni mi mthong bar byed la mu stegs kyis brtags pa'i bdag ces bya ba med pa de mthong bar byed pa'i de'i mun nag de 'jig rten gyi mun pa dang 'dra ba ma yin pa ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mun pa zhig skyes so zhes bya ba'i don to // / +bdag med par zhi ba dang skye bar  rung bar tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba la / /
